data.title: Be Careful When You Drive Past An Accident Scene
authors: Brian Ives // Managing Editor, Beasley Media
data.meta_description: Emergency response teams always have a difficult job, by definition. But when they're called to an incident on a highway in traffic, the danger increases. In
data.text:
Emergency response teams always have a difficult job, by definition. But when they’re called to an incident on a highway in traffic, the danger increases. In this video, shared by Responder Safety, you get the inside view of an incident that shook Smyrna, Delaware’s Citizen’s Hose Company. Watch the video here. It’s eleven and a half minutes and it’s worth your time.

Brian has been working in pop culture and media for about three decades: he’s worked at MTV, VH1, SiriusXM, CBS and Loudwire. Besides working as a writer and an editor-in-chief, he’s also appeared on air as a pundit, guested on radio shows and hosted podcasts. Over the years, he’s interviewed the surviving members of Led Zeppelin, the members of U2, Beyonce, Pink, Usher, Stevie Nicks, Lorde… and is grateful to have had the chance to interview Joe Strummer of the Clash and Tom Petty.
